package.name: HltEvent

attribute.name: decReport
attribute.desc: encoded decision, execution stage, errors, number of candidates and decision ID

bitfield.name: decision
bitfield.desc: decision 1(true)=this trigger line asked to keep the event; 0(false)=this trigger did not ask to keep the event

bitfield.name: numberOfCandidates
bitfield.desc: number of selected candidates passing trigger decision criteria

bitfield.name: executionStage
bitfield.desc: code specifying highest step reached during the trigger line execution (0-255)

method.name: setDecision
setExecutionStage
method.desc: Update code specifying highest step reached during the trigger line execution (0-255)

method.name: saturatedNumberOfCandidates
method.desc: if numberOfCandidates in HltDecReport equals this then actual number might have been larger

method.name: setNumberOfCandidates
method.desc: set numberOfCandidates; set to saturation value if larger than max allowed; set to 0 if negative

method.name: illegalIntDecisionID
method.desc: if intDecisionID in HltDecReport equals this then passed decision ID was out of allowed range

method.name: setIntDecisionID
method.desc: set intDecisionID; set to illegal value if out of allowed range

method.name: invalidIntDecisionID
method.desc: checked if intDecisionID was invalid when set

constructor.argList: bool dec, int stage, unsigned int eb, int noc, int decID
constructor.desc: create from subfield inputs with allowed range checking

constructor.argList: bool dec, unsigned int eb, int noc, int decID
constructor.desc: create from subset of subfield inputs with allowed range checking

method.name: fillStream

class.name: HltDecReports
class.author: Tomasz Skwarnicki
class.desc: managed container of Hlt Trigger Decision Reports
